datafield.subfield: Do not confuse with Musica Antiqua Wien, Musica Antiqua KoĚln, Musica Antiqua (Musical group : 1978- ), or Musica Antiqua (Musical group : 1981- )
Medieval and early Renaissance music [SR] p1977 (a.e.)
label (played by Musica Antiqua) container (formed 1962 by Michael Uridge and others)

v. 4 (Musica Antiqua ; Michael Uridge, director; formed 1962; based in Worthing, England; instrumentalists: Michael Uridge, Patrick Taylor, Margaret Taylor, Shirley Vaughan, Kevin Coates, David Hills, Neil Turner, Muriel Vickers; singers: Sheila Hills, Anne Metherell, Kathleen Moody, Deborah Moody, Dorothy Uridge, Muriel Vickers, Pamela Vaughan, Patrick Moody, Neil Turner, Peter Vaughan)
Medieval and Renaissance songs and dances [SR] p1980:

label (The Antiqua Musica; [no names given on labels or container for conductor or performers]; Mediaeval and renaissance sounds, v. 4 on Desto DC 7192, which has almost exactly the same contents, is performed by Musica Antiqua conducted by Michael Uridge)
